Sentencas: Ceramic materials used in solid-oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are subjected to high thermal stresses which is a result of the unequal thermal expansion coefficient of different layers.
Titulo: Performance of Two-Dimensional Functionally Graded Anode Supported Solid-Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: As a result, SOFCs are susceptible to failure at elevated temperatures, and therefore the maximum operating temperature is limited.
Titulo: Performance of Two-Dimensional Functionally Graded Anode Supported Solid-Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Consequently, the power density is limited as well.
Titulo: Performance of Two-Dimensional Functionally Graded Anode Supported Solid-Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Fuel cells with electrodes that have graded compositions in the thickness direction have been investigated to control the thermal expansion.
Titulo: Performance of Two-Dimensional Functionally Graded Anode Supported Solid-Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In this study, two-dimensional grading is proposed for the electrodes and compared with the one-dimensional grading in terms of thermal stress and performance.
Titulo: Performance of Two-Dimensional Functionally Graded Anode Supported Solid-Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: A comprehensive model is developed for high-temperature SOFCs that include the momentum, species, energy, and charge transport equations.
Titulo: Performance of Two-Dimensional Functionally Graded Anode Supported Solid-Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Furthermore, the bilinear elastoplastic model is used for the calculation of thermal stresses and failure of solids.
Titulo: Performance of Two-Dimensional Functionally Graded Anode Supported Solid-Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Two-dimensional functionally graded electrodes are studied in which the grading is implemented in the thickness and length directions.
Titulo: Performance of Two-Dimensional Functionally Graded Anode Supported Solid-Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Results indicate that continuous one-dimensional grading functions reduced thermal stresses by 40% for m = 0.8 compared with conventional electrodes.
Titulo: Performance of Two-Dimensional Functionally Graded Anode Supported Solid-Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: It also improved the electrochemical performance, as the maximum power density increased by 15%.
Titulo: Performance of Two-Dimensional Functionally Graded Anode Supported Solid-Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: For the 2D piecewise linear grading function, a further improvement of reducing thermal stresses by an extra 16.5% is obtained.
Titulo: Performance of Two-Dimensional Functionally Graded Anode Supported Solid-Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Two-dimensional graded SOFCs can therefore operate at higher temperatures safely in terms of thermal stresses.
Titulo: Performance of Two-Dimensional Functionally Graded Anode Supported Solid-Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: This creates an opportunity to fabricate high-temperature, compact SOFCs for high-power applications.
Titulo: Performance of Two-Dimensional Functionally Graded Anode Supported Solid-Oxide Fuel Cells
